settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.title: Avoid Allergic Reactions
settings.text: Table & Twine’s allergy-friendly meal kits make dinnertime enjoyable – not stressful. Since our chefs thoughtfully develop these recipes, you don’t need to worry about uncomfortable symptoms like coughing or digestive upset.

settings.title: Eliminate Time-Consuming Label Examination
settings.text: Whether you have a serious nut allergy or a mild gluten sensitivity, you likely spend loads of time reading nutrition labels. Fortunately, when you order an allergy-friendly meal kit from Table & Twine, you can simply untwine and dine.

settings.title: Everyone Can Eat at the Same Time
settings.text: All Table & Twine meals – allergy-friendly or not – can be prepared in 15 minutes or less. That means even if you order a different dish from your wife and kids, you can all start eating in just 15 minutes.

settings.section_heading: Why Choose an Allergy-Friendly Meal Kit in Charlotte?
settings.text: Our talented chefs have developed a variety of allergy-friendly meals that are delicious and convenient. Since these dishes are easy to prepare and come in single-serving portions, you can enjoy a meal with the rest of your family. Other benefits of allergy-friendly meal kits include:

Unparalleled Convenience: This Easter, you can rest easy knowing that Table & Twine has your back for food preparation. Your meal kit comes with every ingredient you need, all pre-prepared to save you time. Even better, less steps and thoughtful packaging means less cleaning up afterwards.

Polished Meal Designed by Professionals: No matter your comfort level in the kitchen, Table & Twine is here to help you put a sophisticated meal on the table. Our professional chefs curate a menu of dishes sure to impress your guests with quality ingredients. While this may seem overwhelming, all the prep work is done so you just need to enhance the flavors in the oven or on the stove.

Mouthwatering Flavors: We love bringing people together over delicious food to help them make lasting memories. Our dishes accomplish this with unforgettable flavors and a personalized dining experience. With seasonal ingredients and a carefully selected menu, everyone will find something they love on the table.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: Why Choose an Easter Meal Kit?
settings.text2: Partnering with Table & Twine makes planning your Easter get-together easier than ever. After placing an order with our convenient online system, you will enjoy benefits such as:

settings.title: How much time is required to prepare the food in my Easter meal kit?
settings.text: Set aside two hours to prepare the dishes in your Easter meal kit. This allows you to develop the flavors in the kitchen with plenty of time leftover for spending with loved ones.

settings.title: How far in advance do I need to order my Easter meal kit?
settings.text: In order to receive your meal kit by Easter, please order by Sunday April 10th. Simply place an order online and we’ll handle the rest.

settings.title: Can I customize my Easter meal kit?
settings.text: No, the Easter meal kit cannot be customized. Table & Twine works hard to intentionally limit the menu so we can deliver outstanding flavor. However, we also choose a variety of dishes to ensure there’s something for everyone.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
